argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | possumd.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) |
| 2 |  | possumd.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_renegcld | |- ( ph -> -u B e. RR ) |
| 4 | 3, 1 | #P_posdifd | |- ( ph -> ( -u B < A <-> 0 < ( A - -u B ) ) ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_subnegd | |- ( ph -> ( A - -u B ) = ( A + B ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_breq2d | |- ( ph -> ( 0 < ( A - -u B ) <-> 0 < ( A + B ) ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 8 | #P_bitr2d | |- ( ph -> ( 0 < ( A + B ) <-> -u B < A ) ) |
